member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform3D.SetAngle
member.summary: Changes the value of the Angle property of a 3D rotation transform. The Angle property specifies the rotation angle. The default value is zero.
member.param: The new rotation angle, in degrees. Positive values are interpreted as the thumb-down (into the page), right hand rule where the thumb points in the Z direction and the fingers follow a clockwise direction. Negative values are interpreted as the thumb-up (out of the page), right hand rule. For values less than -360 or greater than 360, the values wrap around and are treated as if the mathematical operation mod(360) was applied.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform3D.SetAngle
member.summary: Animates the value of the Angle property of a 3D rotation transform. The Angle property specifies the rotation angle. The default value is zero.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the Angle property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform3D.SetAxisX
member.summary: Changes the value of the AxisX property of a 3D rotation transform. The AxisX property specifies the x-coordinate for the axis vector of rotation. The default value is zero.
member.param: The new x-coordinate for the axis vector of rotation.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform3D.SetAxisX
member.summary: Animates the value of the AxisX property of a 3D rotation transform. The AxisX property specifies the x-coordinate for the axis vector of rotation. The default value is zero.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the AxisX property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform3D.SetAxisY

member.param: The new y-coordinate for the axis vector of rotation.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform3D.SetAxisZ
member.summary: Changes the value of the AxisZ property of a 3D rotation transform. The AxisZ property specifies the z-coordinate for the axis vector of rotation. The default value is 1.0.
member.param: The new z-coordinate for the axis vector of rotation.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform3D.SetAxisZ
member.summary: Animates the value of the AxisZ property of a 3D rotation transform. The AxisZ property specifies the z-coordinate for the axis vector of rotation. The default value is 1.0.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform3D.SetCenterX
member.summary: Changes the value of the CenterX property of a 3D rotation transform. The CenterX property specifies the x-coordinate of the point about which the rotation is performed. The default value is zero.
member.param: The new x-coordinate of the center point.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform3D.SetCenterX
member.summary: Animates the value of the CenterX property of a 3D rotation transform. The CenterX property specifies the x-coordinate of the point about which the rotation is performed. The default value is zero.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the CenterX property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionRotateTransform3D
member.summary: Represents a 3D transformation that affects the rotation of a visual along an arbitrary axis in 3D space. The coordinate system is rotated around the specified center point.
